Mendokusai

Tartarus

Thoughts and Words

08 Apr 2019

Unless you’re that weird Radical Honesty dude, then there is a significant gap between the thoughts and feelings you experience and the words you use to communicate them to the world around you. It seems intuitive to me that in general, the smaller the gap, the happier the person. Mine is definitely significantly larger than I would like it to be, and I feel like I am constantly trying to make it smaller - but it is a steep mountain to climb, and I am very scared to do so. I suppose I will have to channel my inner Madeline and get it done though.
